original_text: How much then is a man better than a sheep? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days.
korean_text: 사람이 양보다 얼마나 더 귀하냐 그러므로 안식일에 선을 행하는 것이 옳으니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: How much then is a man better than a sheep?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 사람이 양보다 얼마나 더 귀한가?

sentences.original_text: Wherefore it is lawful to do well
